data = {'direct': {'bacterial': {'equipments': {'101': {'enabled': True, 'perUnitArea': {'unit': 'sqcm', 'value': 5}, 'perUni...m', 'value': 29}, 'perUnitVolume': {'unit': 'ml', 'value': 30}, 'rinseLimit': 0, ...}, ...}, 'policy': 'policyBased'}}}
response_type = 'direct', microbial_type = 'fungal', surface_unit = 'sqcm', volume_unit = 'ml'

    def compare_bioburden_limits_split(self, data, response_type, microbial_type, surface_unit="sqcm",
                                       volume_unit="ml"):
        microbial_policy = self.policy_microbial.test_get_microbial_cleaning_limits_policy()["response"]
        policy_data = json.loads(microbial_policy)
    
        first_response = self.extract_values(policy_data, response_type)
        second_response = self.get_limits(data, response_type, microbial_type)
    
        # Extract microbial values from the first response
        swab_response = first_response.get(f'{response_type.capitalize()} - Swab', {})
        microbial_swab_first_response = self.extract_microbial_values(swab_response, microbial_type)
        per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = None
        if microbial_type == "fungal":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = swab_response.get('unclassified', {}).get(
                'fungal_per_unit_volume')
    
        if microbial_type == "bacterial":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = swab_response.get('unclassified', {}).get(
                'bacterial_per_unit_volume')
    
        # Extract microbial values from the second response more explicitly
        second_response_key = list(second_response.keys())[0] if second_response else None
        microbial_swab_second_response = second_response.get(second_response_key, {}).get('swab_limit', {}).get('value')
        per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response = second_response.get(
            second_response_key, {}).get('swab_limit', {}).get('perUnitArea', {}).get('value')
    
        if surface_unit == "sqm":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response = per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response * 0.0001
        if surface_unit == "sqin":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response = per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response * 0.155
        if volume_unit == "l":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response = per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response * 0.001
    
        # Compare values with assert statements
        if microbial_swab_first_response is not None and microbial_swab_second_response is not None:
            assert round(microbial_swab_first_response, 3) == round(microbial_swab_second_response, 3), \
                (
                    f"{response_type.capitalize()} Swab {microbial_type.capitalize()} Values {microbial_swab_first_response}"
                    f" Do Not Match with {microbial_swab_second_response}")
        if per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response is not None and per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response is not None:
>           assert round(per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response) == round(per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response), \
                (
                    f"{response_type.capitalize()} Swab perUnitAreaAndVolume Values {per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response}"
                    f" Do Not Match with {per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response}")
